Source.Name: libedit
Source.Summary: An autotool- and libtoolized port of the NetBSD Editline library
Source.Description: This is an autotool- and libtoolized port of the NetBSD Editline library (libedit). This Berkeley-style licensed command line editor library provides generic line editing, history, and tokenization functions, similar to those found in GNU Readline.
